section.57: One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)

hadiths.text: Narrated Muawiya:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said, "If Allah wants to do good for somebody, he makes him comprehend the Religion (i.e. Islam), and Allah is the Giver and I am Al-Qasim (i.e. the distributor), and this (Muslim) nation will remain victorious over their opponents, till Allah's Order comes and they will still be victorious
